methods.name: create
methods.description:
Requires user login.

See Photos: Create (Upload) a Photo for the request parameters supported by this method.

Data is returned in the photos property of the parameter passed to the callback.

parameters.summary: Parameters to send in the request.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Callback function to execute when the method completes.
